name: Sierra's Sourdough Bread
steps: Mix the starter with warm water
Mix the salt & flour & then slowly add to the starter/water mix
Mix until it starts pulling away dough from the sides of the bowl (you may need to add more water or flour depending on the texture)
Spray a bowl with olive oil and place in your dough. Put on an airtight top (this is where the magic happens)
in 30 min stretch, then in another 30 min stretch (can do up to 4 times but 2 is ok)
Freeze for 20 min. Then place parchment paper over top of bowl, plate, then flip.
Preheat oven to 500 with dutch oven inside (if you put a pan under the dutch oven on bottom rack, prevents bottom of bread from burning)
Reduce heat to 450 when putting the dough in the oven. Cook with top on for 30 min
reduce heat to 400 degrees, remove top and cook for 10 min
